summary: Maze Network - New Technology Layer 1 Blockchain - Maze Network is a scalable Layer 1 blockchain designed to support a wide range of decentralized applications (dApps) and digital assets. With a transaction throughput of 75,000 transactions per second (TPS), an average transaction latency of 400 milliseconds, an Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatibility, and a Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, Maze Blockchain aims to provide a robust and efficient platform for decentralized finance (DeFi) and other blockchain-based innovations.
